channel.title: touchscreen on Dipankar's blog
channel.description: Recent content in touchscreen on Dipankar's blog

item.title: Touchscreen, health effects ?
item.description: Well, I was thinking today the whole world is suddenly all about touch screens ! Just like all other devices, I am sure it has some effect on humans. I started doing some research as to the published papers on this topic, turns out that there are none. So here is my take on what can be the potential issues with touchscreens ergonomic issues, it can lead to issues with your finger with longer term use of such devices.
